website_summaries.verdict: Though not for everyone, if you like the look of snow on your artificial Christmas tree, this attractive model won't disappoint.
pros: Provides a beautiful effect thanks to the thick, flocked branches with realistic, snow-covered look
Made of PVC needles that are easy to handle
cons: Artificial "snow" occasionally flakes off, but most owners didn't report major issues with the flocked branches

customer_reviews.title: ... King of Christmas for our Living Room and absolutely love it! So easily to assemble (it comes in ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this 6 Foot Prince Flock Tree from King of Christmas for our Living Room and absolutely love it! So easily to assemble (it comes in three parts) and the branches seamlessly fall to form the tree shape. The flocking on it is SO realistic in looks just like an outdoor tree perfectly kissed by snow! I would highly recommend this tree & King of Christmas to purchase your next Christmas tree from!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tree ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I love this tree! It’s gorgeous, perfect amount of white and green! The perfect size! Easy to set up! The snow is a little messy but that’s to be expected! It’s amazing quality! Oh and here’s a tip: be sure to buy white lights on a WHITE wire... the green wire will stick out like a sore thumb!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: What a gorgeous, stunning tree. I’ve spent days looking at artificial trees in stores and nothing compares to this one. This tree surpassed my expectations. The snow looks real, the shape is flawless, I was able (5’5” 110 pounds woman) to assemble this by myself. I ordered the 8’ by 54” wide tree and it is extremely full and thick. No holes in the shape. The packaged shipped the day I ordered it and arrived 2 days later. This is a high quality tree from a fantastic distributor.
customer_reviews.author: foresme

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Nicely shaped. Lots of flock. Easy to work with. LOVED THEM. Used seven trees at our wedding of different sizes. All this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bob McCranie

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Tree EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is DA BOMB! I have always wanted a flocked tree, bought it last year and kept in box till now. The tree is super easy to assemble just the stand, bottom, middle and top. Then, just fluff and VIOLA!, I was skeptical about the flocking but fear not, it does not shed or make a mess. The shape, ease of assembly and beauty of this tree make it a winner. Buy it. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mn

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like a huge amount of flocking came off and it ...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a huge amount of flocking came off and it still would... I was severely tempted to return the whole thing, but was persuaded not to. As long as we don't bump into it there won't be a "snowfall" under it. I highly recommend getting a fluffy white tree skirt to hide the fallen flocking.. Otherwise, it was very pretty and people complimented it. We never got tired of looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Gogogadgetsheetrock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Arrived in a compact box
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Arrived in a compact box, so fluffing the branches is a must, but with each branch you arrange, you will be impressed with the quality construction. I was surprised with the fullness of the branches and the quality flocking. I like the option of adding my own light and love how my led colored lights glow in among the flocked branches. Hardley any mess.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high-quality, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 7 ft tree last week, and set it up yesterday. It is the most beautiful, best constructed artificial Christmas tree I have ever owned. It looks full and expensive. And it was a dream to set up -- so easy! It is heavily flocked, and I was pleased at how little of the flocking came off during set up. It's much better than the flocking you'll see on cheaper trees. This tree is worth every penny. I'm so happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: L. OsborneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Christmas tree EVER. The branches are very sturdy, and the flocking on the tree is so pretty. I bought the ten foot tree and it is huge. There are about five different pieces, the box it comes in is massive and each branch has its own steam. Seriously it is STUNNING, and the price was out of this world. I have spent over $300.00 on a live 9 foot flocked tree for the last couple years. I got my moneys worth on this purchase. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danyial Merriam

customer_reviews.title: I thought this tree was too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I thought this tree was too good to be true. But honestly, I love it! its full, easy to fluff, easy to put together and it didn't have an odor like some fake trees do. We put cinnamon pinecones stuffed in it in random places, it looks so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lavenderhippy24

customer_reviews.title: It’s a YES from me!
customer_reviews.text: We were unsure which tree we wanted. There are SO many choices available these days. Real or artificial? Full or thin framed? Natural looking or snow kissed flock appearance? We went with the modestly sized flocked tree. At first we weren’t sure, but followed other reviews to thoroughly fluff it. It is AMAZING!! Make sure to get white on white lights (green strings would stick out like a sore thumb). If you are on the fence, go for it! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MaddieMooo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tree. Since it's only October, I haven't fluffed it up or decorated it yet. I did assemble the 3 pieces just to see what it looks like. Very easy to assemble. No snow came off when taking it out of the box. But, definitely a little messy once you start touching the branches, which is to be expected. Looks very full from what I can see without shaping or fluffing it. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: In love. So pretty. Exactly what i pictured. This is the 9foot flocked tree. It did take me over an hour to fluff it to my liking. Some flocking did come off when i was putting the lights on, so be gentle when decorating. It did have a bit of a strong smell once out of the box, but i sprayed some febreeze on it and all good now. I also sneezed a lot while fluffing it, i’m assuming either dust from being in the warehouse or the flocking itself. So if you’re an allergy person, just be prepared lol
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: A big mess
customer_reviews.text: The tree is extremely messy as the flicking flies everywhere. Once asssembled, we realized the tree was crooked and the stand wasn’t balanced. The tree is also not 7ft., it is shorter and not wide like the picture. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: King of Christmas indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully flocked Christmas tree. It looks so natural. Very easy to assemble and little snow shed. Packed nicely and shipping was fast too. Looks better in person than on Amazon. I thought it was going to be a slim tree but it is a nice full tree and the bottom too. The price cannot be beat! (I did my research LoL) The picture below is right out of the box with opened branches; not even prepped to decorate and it looks amazing! The after photo with decorations too.
customer_reviews.author: Boxerella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful tree. It came a few days late, and I was going to send it back, but we took it out of the box and set it up. We could not send it back after that. It's gorgeous! Love the tree and would recommend it to anyone looking for a flocked tree this year. The price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Zoppelt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tree; however you must be willing to put up with all the dust and cotton like particles that fall off to the ground. I would definitely not recommend this tree for carpeted areas; maybe set up at another location or place plastic underneath. Like any other boxes artificial tree, you’ll need to spend some time to spread out the branches for a natural look. The top for reason is very dense compared to the rest of the tree. The tree is not plumb and is leaning when erected, but the easy fix is a few shins that will be covered by the tree skirt anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!! Best Christmas purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to buy a tree off Amazon and then the thought of having to return it made me cringe. At first the price threw me off, I had never bought an artificial tree before, and thought it was much more than I expected. However, I went to several different stores and this seemed to be the average price. The tree is BEAUTIFUL. My family who complains about everything actually had something to compliment! I got the 7 foot & it’s a perfect height. Single mom of 3 littles and I was able to install and put up within 10 mins on my own! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Ty Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous tree
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful not nearly as wide as my old tree which originally threw me off but i love it. Very thick, full and quick and easy to fluff. All hinged which i have never had. It was very quick to assemble. The stand is a bit janky though. There is only one screw to hold the tree in place and it should have three so it wobbles while decorating. Other than that i would have given 5 stars. And yes its flocked so you will have alittle mess to clean up but nothing terrible. Pictures and videos are of tree all decorated but tree collar not on do you could see.
customer_reviews.author: bowhntngbabe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Christmas tree! Great packing so got very safely! I will keep this tree forever!
customer_reviews.author: Sungho Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flocked tree
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful and tall. We got the 7’ and the bottom seemed Thin, not surprised but as you bend and open the branches and stay adding ornaments it fills out quickly! It’s by far the most beautiful tree we hav ever had real or fake! So glad we decided upon this one! I love the flock! It’s thick and really stays on the tree...not a lot fell off During assembly and decorating. I loved to be able to bend the branches to hang heavy ornaments anywhere I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: kellyjlo

customer_reviews.title: very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning Christmas tree, very easy to assemble. I couldn't be any happier with my purchase.I have attached some pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiu Luca

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well priced tree (and my cats leave it alone!)
customer_reviews.text: First time with a flocked tree. Slight shedding as I set it up, but nearly none since. Flocking seems well adhered to tree. My husband thinks its very attractive. He tells me every night how much he likes it. Full, well proportioned, just the right size for a smaller house. And amazingly, my cats don't like the flocking so they leave tree alone. I thought for sure they would be all up inside it, as they have in past years, but apparently not anymore! Easy to set up alone by 68 year old woman and fits in its box right in my hall closet easily. A winner for us!
customer_reviews.author: LadyExec

customer_reviews.title: My Tree Has Xmas Pattern Baldness
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just got a bad tree, but mine is very sparse at the bottom. It will take some strategic ornament placement to hide the bald spots. If the tree had been as full as it looks in the picture, it would have been worth the price, but since I have to do so much adjusting to hide the bare spots it seems overpriced for what I got.
customer_reviews.author: F. Madrone

customer_reviews.title: YES! GET THE TREE!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. It’s absolutely beautiful. I am so glad I purchased this (without my husbands permission, but sometimes it’s just easier to ask forgiveness ;) ) We celebrated the our first Christmas in our first home together this year and this tree was everything I wanted and more. It has such an even flocking all around and even though it sheds, it’s not a lot. It’s a very full tree as well. All-in-all, I am incredibly happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: India Aust

customer_reviews.title: So Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This tree is beautiful!! As soon as it arrived I pulled it out of the box and fluffed it and it is absolutely beautiful!! I can’t wait to decorate it for Christmas. It’s very full and the flocking is perfect, not too much or too little, just enough. It’s three pieces and the branches are hinged. The base of the tree is metal and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shop4deals

customer_reviews.title: The Most Beautiful Tree I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the 9 ft. prince tree in the evening. It is by far the most beautiful tree I have ever bought. I currently own 5 different types of trees. I cannot believe how little I paid for such an amazing tree. I will only ever buy King of Christmas trees from now on. A side note: I am glad I read the reviews first and found out about the "fall out" from the flocking. It is messy when you first put it up, so be prepared. But so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Farmhouse vibe
customer_reviews.text: It’s never too early to think about Christmas, right? We just finished redoing our sunroom and I bought this 6ft prince flocked tree for a great price on sale. Tree is nice and full and just beautiful. I set it up early to ensure product wasn’t damaged and I absolutely love it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and affordable but there is some shedding
customer_reviews.text: The tree is full and beautiful. The only downside for me was the shedding while assembling. I read many reviews that noted there was little to no shedding, but that was not the case for me. It was very messy, but with that being said, the tree is beautiful and worth the price. I would buy it again and look forward to years of use. My next purchase will definitely be a taller tree but that will be in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this tree!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tree. I received it this weekend and I'm still in awe of how beautiful it is. I assembled it pretty quickly and easily (25 year-old female). I was surprised how little flocking fell off the tree and just how FULL it was. Overall, I feel like this will last many, many years. I got the 7' tree and really couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Very full and beautiful once it's fluffed
customer_reviews.text: This is the 9 ft tree! Very full and beautiful once it's fluffed. Authentic looking snow... absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Henry

customer_reviews.title: Get it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is gorgeous! Very easy to set up, super fast shipping, got it a day earlier than expected. I’ve searched the entire internet couldn’t find a better deal than this amazing 7’ King of Christmas Tree. Get it! I promise you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Spacetime617

customer_reviews.title: Love My Flocked Tree!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is beautiful. I've always wanted a flocked tree, and I'm glad I waited until I could buy a good one! This IS a good one, the flocking looks like real snow, and while it does shed a bit, it's not enough to be a constant concern. It needs some attention to fluff the branches properly, but I would say it took me 30 minutes to get the tree looking like my photos show. The tree doesn't disappoint! Looks expensive and classy. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Acountrygirl06

customer_reviews.title: it is petite pretty tree.
customer_reviews.text: This tree is ALOT smaller than the picture suggest. The diameter is small and the bottom branches do not go to the floor ( what i was looking for). It's overpriced for what you get. On the positive...it is petite pretty tree.
customer_reviews.author: wanda broyles

customer_reviews.title: this is a good investment. I went to many different stores and ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t leave reviews very often but people, I can assure you, this is a good investment. I went to many different stores and didn’t find anything like this style below $300. In the pictures the tree isn’t finished all the way, but it gives pretty good idea of the cute looking!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Such a gorgeous tree!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this tree! It's the fullest one I've had yet and the flocking is so beautifully done. It wasn't even very messy setting it up! I've found my dream tree and I'm sure it will last us many many years. Well worth the money! Do yourself a favor and buy this tree. I may never buy from another company again I'm so happy with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: A Absolutely Beautiful Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: I brought the 7 foot tree and it is wonderful. I had trouble with shipping which it seems like a lot of other people had also. It was easy to assemble, 3 parts and all hinged so no missing branches. The flocking is a bit messing during assembly but that to be expected. Once the bottom is fluffed the other sections flocking particles will just fall onto the bottom part. The height is correct, I measured and the width could have been wider but It’s fine for now. I will be purchasing the bigger one next year.
customer_reviews.author: E. C.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed. The tree is perfect and full and gorgeous and I'm just so happy with it. I can see this lasting a long time and if and when it ever loses it's flocking I will just reflock it myself because I just want to keep it forever! A 6ft is perfect for the corner we use it in. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Gracyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My first flocked tree and I am thrilled. Really makes the ornaments pop! Easy to set up with very little mess.
customer_reviews.author: Icecream92

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully flocked but thin
customer_reviews.text: The tree is beautiful and has very thick nice flocking. Only lost a small amount when setting up. Also very easy setup with 3 sections and the stand. Unfortunately for me it's very thin. My old tree was very fat and jolly. This tree should have been advertised as slim. I'm going to have to return it. But if you like slimmer trees this one really is quite beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but also messy
customer_reviews.text: I love this tree, looks super beautiful and very easy to set up. My only complaint is that the snow does not stay on the tree very good. I often have to sweep under the tree. I can’t use a vacuum because the air from the vacuum makes it come off even more. It’s a bit a of a hassle and I normally end up sneezing a lot when I put it up from the fake snow but still think it’s very pretty and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this tree
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tree...easy to assemble...the flocking is beautiful...heavily flocked..use lites with white cords..the branches are nice and thick...I can't wait to get it all decorated...perfect size for an apartment..!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary mcgivern Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 6 FT prince, I personally wish I would have ordered the 7 FT tree in hopes that it was more full and for a tad bit taller in height. Overall, tree looks good but sheds horribly. Not an easy clean up job or removel from clothes. Excited to see what it will look like decorated, hoping it creates a more full look once complete. For $128 I can’t really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Saba

customer_reviews.title: Broken branches
customer_reviews.text: This tree is beautiful. But, I’m super bummed out that some of the branches are broken and falling apart. I literally just opened it and I do not want to send it back and go through that hassle. Also, getting it straight and secure in the stand is nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Edwards

customer_reviews.title: First artificial tree & very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first artificial Christmas tree and I am very glad to say that I was definitely surprised by how good it actually looks. Much thanks to the other reviewers that posted photos. The tree looks exactly like it is presented and while I am planning on having a real tree next year, I definitely plan to put this one on display as well.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The flocking on this tree looks horrible. Looks nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: smaller than appears
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty tree for the price, it's right at 6 ft..at the very top!!! But, it's slimmer than it looked in pics. almost, like a pencil tree. Assembly, super easy! if you have a small area for it, it will be perfect. My room is large, so it's looks too small. Other than size, i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: joesmile

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Flocked Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always obsessed over flocked trees and i dreamt of having one. After tons of research i went with King Of Christmas and I am not disappointed. It looked gorgeous. I shopped around at retailers and the quality of this tree is great. I really feel like it was worth my money. I’m considering buying a second tree from them for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Not a cheap looking tree at all!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and beautifully flocked! Flocking (snow look) is abundant and realistic looking! Does not look like a cheap tree at all (see photo). I get so many compliments and people begging me to know where I got my tree! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bella

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tree! It looks exactly like on the photos
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tree! It looks exactly like on the photos. What is also important - setting up the tree didn't make a mess (yes, it did shed a bit, but that was expected). Also, the King of Christmas has a great customer service. I asked them to adjust the price, and they did it immediately. J
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is gorgeous!! I assembled it by myself in a few minutes! Fluffing took a little bit longer, but wow this tree is magnificent! I love that I won’t have to keep repurchasing trees in the coming years! A hundred percent recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cat G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is absolutely gorgeous!!! I'm in love with this beauty! It looks like a real tree with snow on it. The pictures dont do any justice to it. Worth every penny!!! It came in 3 parts. Super easy to put together. Strong and strudy. King of Christmas outdid themselves with this beautiful tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_customer72

customer_reviews.title: One of vetter values available
customer_reviews.text: Over all pleased with purchase. In terms of quality and price is one of better trees out there. Similar ones are 100 plus more dollars. Was concerned lower branches would be sparse during set up but a good pull apart of branches helped it alot. The top is very full, bottom little less full but tolerable. Not noticeable after decorated. Had 1 lower branch droop a little lower but not complaining. Little flock came off during set up but expected. Still plenty on it. Overall satisfied with tree for price,😁
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Full beautiful tree
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this tree for a week or so but I love it so far. It didn’t qualify for prime shipping but still arrived in two days and almost a whole week before the tracking said it would. I loved that it came in the odd height of 8 feet for my 9 foot ceilings. It was $10 cheaper on amazon than the company website. It’s a really beautiful tree for the very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for two Days straight before purchasing and I am so glad I did. My son has been asking me for a white Christmas tree for years so decided to do this year. I bought the 6 feet flocked tree and it was perfect took a few minutes to assemble and a few minutes to fluff and put the stems in place. I just have lights on it and it’s soo pretty already. I am happy I purchased. I will add a final Photo when I add the ornaments. Loooooove it!!!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: White Christmas
customer_reviews.text: We love our new tree, looks just like the pictures! We looked around for a nice snowy style tree and most seemed scraggly and came across this one on Amazon. The pictures already posted were really nice and we are happy to also show off ours and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Blackmer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this tree for a few years and finally just bought it. Delivered yesterday & set it up same day. I'm so in love!! Its beautiful, study, not too messy with the flock. Three parts, very easy to assemble. Just perfection. Cant wait to decorate it. **Lights were not included**
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: straighten each section before adding another. Much easier!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is absolutely beautiful! Easy to assemble and the flock work is amazingly done. I did not have much come off when straightening branches. I love this tree and so so happy with this purchase!! Delivered on time too as expected! This is the 7.5” tree.
customer_reviews.author: VFL

customer_reviews.title: Best tree ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a flocked tree. This tree was beyond my expectations because it's fully flocked on every branch, the tree is packed full of branches (no holes no spaces). We told our granddaughter that the tree has magic snow.
customer_reviews.author: Imeon M.

customer_reviews.title: Good, pretty tree.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good tree and looks really nice in any living room. The flocking doesn’t come off very easily, which I’m surprised and happy about. My only complaint is that there’s a lot more empty space between branches than I’d like. But for the price I paid, it’s not unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Got 9 foot and it was perfect. No crap all over from flocking
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Got 9 foot and it was perfect. No crap all over from flocking
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bressert

customer_reviews.title: Very good tree
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, price was ok. Tree looks great, very full in most areas although some not to full. Even if I rotate part A,B,C to ensure best fullness. Although great tree :) love it . Could have better base stand but not bad
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tree - came right on time and far surpasses my expectations. Beautiful!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: So the tree is very nice but it’s not six foot
customer_reviews.text: So the tree is very nice but it’s not six foot! With it on the stand I am 5,8” and I stand taller that the tree. This was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJR

customer_reviews.title: I would give the rating as average it’s cute easy too assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a 6 foot tree. I expected more because of the pictures that were posted, I would give the rating as average it’s cute easy too assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Space saving tree
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a nice sized flocked tree, and you don't need it already prelit, this tree does not take up a lot of floor space. With a diameter of just over 3 ft, it works rather well in smaller rooms and apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Lieverdink

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tree
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tree. Wish I could go bigger but not enough room for one right now. Maybe later but am very happy and can't wait to see it decorated this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Christmas Tree of all time!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and I’m worried at first for the white stuff that maybe fying every where when I put it up but surprisingly there is but only a few! We really love this tree and now I can say my most favorite tree among the rest that we had! Kiddos to the people behind making this tree you really touched our hearts and our holiday pictures will be something special this time! Lol
customer_reviews.author: edgardo avendano

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD Definitely recommend THIS TREE
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Worth every penny the first go around. Not sure how it will store after Christmas or how it will look next year but I was pleasantly surprised how nice it looks. Was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Cmillerberg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Received tons of complements. The flocking is beautiful. Super easy to assemble and disassemble. We have 12 foot ceilings and the tree went right to the top. I believe the tree itself is 10 ft. with a 2 ft stand. So I was super happy that the tree touched our tall ceiling! Large, gorgeous, full tree!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in and I went ahead and put it up instead of storing it only to bring it all back down again in a month. I really like this tree. I live in Houston so it NEVER snows here and I love the flocked trees but they are so expensive at Hobby Lobby, At Home and other stores like that. Each section is clearly labeled, it has lots of stems it took me about 30 minutes by myself to assemble and pull each branch and tip down to my liking. It did shed quite a bit but I just ran the vacuum real quick and all the flakes came up easily.
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Tree Envy
customer_reviews.text: We love this tree!! It’s gotten a lot of compliments. Not much is needed to make this tree some alive with decorations/lights. Very elegant. We have had it for 2 years and it’s held up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is gorgeous! I purchased the 6ft. The flocking is perfectly spread out and looks realistic. Unfortunately, one of my 3 branch tips was completely pulled off and hanging. Looks like a manufacture defect. I just twisted the short branches a little to get it to sit there. The tree holds my heavy large ornaments very well. I think I’ll purchase a larger one next year.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: it is very very beautiful. I hope it can last a few years
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 9ft tree, I received several compliments on my tree. The only issue is that some of the branches arrived broken. The overall quality is so-so. As far as overall look, it is very very beautiful. I hope it can last a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: High quality tree
customer_reviews.text: This is the first high quality fake tree I've purchased, and I could immediately notice the difference. It's thick, has a great shape, and was not only easy to assemble, but easy to shape the branches. I've spent hours shaping branches of cheaper trees. The snow covering looks awesome - thick and not cheesy at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to assemble and really looks very real and pretty. I would definitely suggest this to anyone who is looking for an artificial flocked Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Joyjeet Guha

customer_reviews.title: Surprised the girlfriend with this and we really enjoyed it. Not nearly as messy as I feared ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprised the girlfriend with this and we really enjoyed it. Not nearly as messy as I feared and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: David Andrus

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I love this tree but I wish I could have gotten the 8 foot tree. The 7 foot looks small and the bottom is bare. There were two pieces of branches that fell off but other than that it's better from what I have seen in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this tree! It is literally the best tree I have ever owned. The quality is perfect. It’s very thick and super expensive looking but the price was perfect! I couldn’t be happier with my tree!! I would definitely recommend this tree to anyone looking. Also the snow is super realistic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli M.

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I’m inlove with our tree. I don’t want something too colorful so I used champagne, silver and a little bit of gold and bronze as our theme. Bigger ornaments look better if you want to make it look elegant. I bought all decorations at amazon for a better deal including the gift wrappers and ribbons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas Tree!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Christmas Tree !! It looks so beautiful. It was easy to set up and it’s a great value for the price. This is my very first year buying an artificial tree, and I am very pleased with it:)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Decker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks! Really full branches and is really beautiful. I wish it was larger in diameter and it was more that I wanted to pay
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Ford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tree.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sized tree for my downsizing. Went up easily and after opening branches looks beautiful. Never had a flocked tree before, but this looks even better than pic.
customer_reviews.author: KarenNC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tree looks good, but is not a big or full as I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ruckle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: The snow doesn't fall off and making a mess. look amazing real. Easy to assemble. Worth it!.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best Tree You’ll EVER Own
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most beautiful tree o have ever owned. Minimal flock shedding and installation was a breeze. Looks amazing with our without ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Severs

customer_reviews.title: Best tree ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree. I’ve had real trees my whole life this is my first artificial one. I love that the flocking doesn’t come off at all and it was the easiest tree to put together. Got lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tree
customer_reviews.text: We’ve wanted a flocked tree for a long time but always hesitated due to the cost but this one was affordable and didn’t appear cheap once it got here. Everyone complimented us on this tree.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Heavy limbs
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous tree can handle heavy ornaments Flock didn’t come off like other trees
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and Lush
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree!!! It is sooo beautiful and easy to put together! I like it better than the one I saw in Hobby Lobby and was twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Yielding Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tree! Just wish the branches were a little long and more full at the bottom but I love it regardless. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Loves2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Love this tree!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tree. Great quality. Love it! I bought the 6ft tree. Sturdy. Flocked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nishel D. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas Tree!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL. The pic I took doesn’t do it justice. It looks amazing in real life. Yes, white stuff gets everywhere when you put it together/take it apart, but just vacuum it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree
customer_reviews.text: Just stunning and fits perfectly in the spot we chose. Truly a quality tree. Flocking is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: LFAVE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. we got the 7foot , perfect size ... could have gone a little bigger but then the topper would have touched the ceiling and the light show would have been smaller (lol) . The snow is messy during assembly. i used my old wedding dress for a tree skirt and it looks pretty good. Great tree, well worth the money, very full. The bottom was a little sparse but I bent the lower limbs upward and it connected better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clement

customer_reviews.title: I love my tree.
customer_reviews.text: The tree is full no Skippy branches anywhere. In my opinion it is a beautiful tree. I have seen small trees for .more money that looked pitiful! Glad I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not very durable and stand is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The tree stand is very flimsy and is constantly allowing tree to lean to one side. The flocking is realistic looking, but makes a mess when you touch it, sticking to clothes, shoes, carpet etc.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieS

customer_reviews.title: Great value tree!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Christmas tree. So beautiful it doesn't even need ornaments if you don't want any. We bought without lights and added to the tree. It was very cost effective and we'll invest in a pre lit tree in years to come. This was a great purchase to get a QUALITY white tree that is absolutely GORGEOUS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! Easy to assemble, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: The Bull

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tree!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree! Takes some “fluffing” but looks great and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Planman
